name: @mineshop/database
description: MineShop is a free shop website for your Minecraft server !

scripts.watch: SET NODE_ENV=dev && nodemon --ignore db.json -r esm -r dotenv/config lib/index.js
scripts.dev: SET NODE_ENV=dev && node -r esm -r dotenv/config lib/index.js
scripts.prod: SET NODE_ENV=prod && node -r esm -r dotenv/config lib/index.js

author: Maxime6678 <maxime6678.dev@gmail.com>
